ARABIC: وَٱسْتَمِعْ يَوْمَ يُنَادِ ٱلْمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Listen out for the Day when the Summoner shall call out from a nearby place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Take heed that the day the crier calls from a place close (to every one),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Hearken on the Day when the caller will call from a place nearby,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Wait for the day when the trumpet will be sounded from a nearby place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And listen attentively on the day when an announcer will proclaim from a place nearby.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And listen on the Day when the caller will call from a near place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And listen on the day when the crier shall cry from a near place
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And listen thou for the day when the caller shall call from a near place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And listen on the day when the crier crieth from a near place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Hearken! The Day when the caller will call from near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And hearken thou: the Day whereon the caller will call from a place quite near.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And be on the alert for the day when the caller calls from a close quarter,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And listen for the Day when the Caller will call out from a place quiet near,-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And listen on the Day when the caller will call from a near place,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Listen for the Day when the Caller will call from a nearby place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And listen for the Day when the caller calls from a nearby place.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And listen on the Day when the Caller will call out from a place that is near -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:41] And listen — O addressee to My words — on the day when the caller, namely, [the archangel] Isrāfīl, calls out from a place that is near, to the heaven: this is the Rock of the Holy House [of Jerusalem], the place on earth that is the nearest to the heaven. He [Isrāfīl] will say: ‘O withered bones, severed limbs, torn flesh and scattered hairs! God verily commands you to come together for the passing of judgement’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And listen on) Muhammad, so that you can hear the description of it; it is also said that this means: strive, Muhammad, for the day when the angel blows the Trumpet (the day when the crier crieth from a near place) close to heaven, from the dome of Jerusalem, which is the closest spot on earth to heaven by about 12 miles; and it is also said this means: from a close distance from which they can hear from beneath their feet.
